props.query: SELECT latest(`consul.datacenter.catalog.registeredNodes`) as 'Registered', latest(`consul.datacenter.catalog.upNodes`) as 'Up', latest(`consul.datacenter.catalog.passingNodes`) as 'Passing', latest(`consul.datacenter.catalog.warningNodes`) as 'Warning', latest(`consul.datacenter.catalog.criticalNodes`) as 'Critical' FROM Metric facet displayName since 5 minutes ago
props.title: Node Status Per Cluster

props.markdown:
::: beyond
 **HashiCorp Consul** 

Consul is a distributed service mesh to connect, secure, and configure services across any runtime platform and public or private cloud

The Consul integration collects a wide array of metrics which facilitate the diagnosis of performance bottlenecks.


:::

props.query: SELECT latest(`leader`) as 'Current Leader' FROM Metric facet displayName since 5 minutes ago
props.title: Current Leader

props.query: SELECT latest(`consul.datacenter.raft.lastContactAvgInMilliseconds`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minutes FACET displayName
props.title: Average Time Since Leader Contact

props.query: SELECT latest(`consul.datacenter.raft.commitTimeAvgInMilliseconds`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minutes FACET displayName
props.title: Average Leader Raft Log Commit

props.query: SELECT latest(`consul.datacenter.raft.txns`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minutes FACET displayName
props.title: Raft Transactions

props.query: SELECT latest(`consul.agent.txnAvgInMilliseconds`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minutes FACET displayName
props.title: Average Transaction Operation Duration

props.query: SELECT latest(`consul.agent.consul.agent.runtime.allocationsInBytes`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minutes FACET displayName
props.title: Memory Allocated

props.query: SELECT latest(`consul.agent.runtime.virtualAddressSpaceInBytes`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minutes FACET displayName
props.title: Total Virtual Address Space Size

props.query: SELECT latest(`consul.agent.kvStoresAvgInMilliseconds`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES 10 minutes FACET displayName
props.title: Average KV Store Update Duration
